F1 Drivers birthday calendar Maniax

F1 Driver of the day Maniax

Birthday calendar poster board for all Formula 1 drivers

All 867 F1 drivers, excluding those who only took part in non-championship races, test and reserve drivers who did not enter any races and one person who does not deserve to be given F1 driver status due to numerous stupid acts.

F1 Drivers birthday calendar maniax F1æå ±

Chart and analysis

F1 Drivers birthday calendar Maniax:

The largest number of birthdays, eight, occurred on 4 July; seven, on 1 January and 30 September; six, on 22 February, 28 February, 18 March, 23 March, 26 March, 27 August and 2 October.

In terms of the month of birth, the largest number of driver was born in January (91), followed by October (89), March (85), April (78), July (76), and the smallest number in November (58).

Itâs hard to say for sure, as some children may have been born at the end of the year and registered at the beginning of the following year, but if you want your child to be a Formula One driver, you should plan to have them on these dates.

On the other hand, there are 35 days when no F1 drivers have been born.
